cast.name: 艾莉西丝·洛佩兹 Alexis Lopez

introduction: A lonely cemetery worker named Ralph accidentally brings a beautiful young woman back from the dead by reading a resurrection prayer over her grave. With just three days before she returns to the afterlife forever, Ralph must help her live her remaining hours to the fullest while also coming to terms with his own aimless life and with the impending death of his father.一位名叫拉尔夫的孤独的墓地工人不小心通过在她的坟墓上阅读复活祈祷，将一位美丽的年轻女子复活了。在她重新回到这个世界的前三天，拉尔夫必须帮助她充分享受剩下的时间，同时也与他自己的漫无目的的生活以及他父亲即将去世的情况达成协议。
